name: Only One Minute (KikooDX)
description:
This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, hope you will enjoy it ^^

Game features :

  • One minute to beat the game !
  • One big level, divised in 6 zones
  • Precise platformer game
  • Practice mode, so you can learn the road peacefully before attempting the run
  • Seamless transition between zones
  • Easy reset
  • Multiple key bindings
  • 1-bit graphics
  • Probably forgot something ^^'

Controls :

  • Move with WASD, ZQSD or arrow keys
  • Jump with Space, X, up key, J or K
  • Reset by double-tapping R
  • Exit the game with Echap
  • Toggle fullscreen with Alt+Enter

Credits :

  • Game design, level design, code and art by me (KikooDX)
  • Using Game Maker Studio 2, BXFR, Asesprite and Paint.net
  • Fonts by Kenney.nl (assets page)
  • Musics by TamationGames (assets page)

Feel free to share your best time in the comments bellow ;)
